snippet.title: AFL expert tips for Round 20
snippet.content: IT is shaping up as a toss of the coin job this Friday night. The Cats are without Patrick Dangerfield and the Swans are coming off a loss. So who are the experts picking? Top Herald Sun tipster Chris Cavanagh has gone with the Swans to get a valuable road victory. He would want to be right. Second placed Lauren Wood has gone with the Cats. See who the Herald Sun experts are tipping for that game and the rest of Round 20 below.
